title: Tangled Webs
description: Casey Conner has sworn off police work. Killing a kid will do that to you. Except for his nightmares, his new life is good--until some psycho begins copying killings from TV's most violent cop show. As the bodies pile up, Conner's fragile sanity is threatened when he is slowly drawn into the hunt for the killer. Filled with surprising twists, this book will grab you from the very first chapter.
author: Scott Prussing
